name: Curling OnLine
description:
Whether you are a curling fan or you want to discover a new sport game, you enjoy playing Curling Online.
Curling OnLine has beed designed to be as close as possible to reality while providing best gameplay.

With this game, you'll be able to:

-Tune finely stones direction, force and spin
-Sweep to influence stone speed and direction
-Play Against 3 AI Levels
-Play multiplayer with friends and family on same device
-Play Multiplayer OnLine at no extra-cost
-See you rank in leaderboard

Time to compete!
